DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Reduce #yAttack damage taken by #b50%. Reduce #yBlock gained by #b50%. Cancelled if dealt #yAttack damage X times in one turn.
Flipper Flaps are 0-cost Attack cards dealing 1 damage times 2 (3). Exhaust.
Food items are a variety of Skill cards that grant small bonuses. Exhaust.
Reach certain milestones of Bribe to inflict debuffs. Milestones are reached at every 25% of the enemy's HP. Once stacks reach 100% of the enemy's HP, they flee.
